content: sweet oddity art shaun the yeti crochet pattern https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart copyright 2020 of sweet oddity art all rights reserved you are not allowed to sell this pattern you are not allowed to distribute or publish this pattern in any form you are not allowed to alter this pattern in any form sweet oddity art 1 pattern details size 19 inches from foot to top of head with weight 4 yarn and a 3 25 mm hook skill level needed intermediate- suitable for novice crocheters requires patience and precisions when assembling the yeti and basic crochet skills contact info if you have any questions or concerns about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me i will get back to you within 24 hours sweetoddityart@gmail com https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart materials needed yarn bernat velvet yarn worsted weight #4 approximately 150g of main color 50-75g of accent colors color a velvet white yarn color b blue color c light blue color d gray color e brown color f dark blue color g purple hook size d hook or 3 25 mm 21 mm safety eyes scissors sewing needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing abbreviations magic_ring= magic_ring- crochet single_crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop blo= back loops only chain= chain stitch f/o= fasten_off single_crochet= single_crochet stitch inc3= 3 single_crochet in the same stitch sl= slip_stitch half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet double_crochet= double_crochet stitch treble_crochet= triple crochet increase= increase- make two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch decrease=decrease- crochet two stitches together using the decrease method 4 single_crochet increase x 6= repeat the pattern between parentheses 6 times notes do not join rounds unless stated work in a continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern sweet oddity art 2 head crocheted from top of head to bottom with color b 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 increase in each st around= 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 4 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet increase x 5 single_crochet= 24 5 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 30 6 2 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet increase x 5 2 single_crochet= 36 7 5 single_crochet increase x 6= 42 8 3 single_crochet increase 6 single_crochet increase x 5 3 single_crochet= 48 9 7 single_crochet increase x 6= 54 10 4 single_crochet increase 8 single_crochet increase x 5 4 single_crochet= 60 11 9 single_crochet increase x 6= 66 12-21 single_crochet in each st around place eyes between rounds 16 and 17 of the head leaving 15 holes between them 22 9 single_crochet decrease x 6= 60 23 4 single_crochet decrease 8 single_crochet decrease x 5 4 single_crochet= 54 24 7 single_crochet decrease x 6= 48 25 3 single_crochet decrease 6 single_crochet decrease x 5 3 single_crochet= 42 26 5 single_crochet decrease x 6= 36 start stuffing the head 27 2 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet decrease x 5 2 single_crochet= 30 28 3 single_crochet decrease x 6= 24
